comment.author: 21734563@N04
comment._content:
He appears to be holding the winding stem to a pocket watch between his thumb and index finger?  This may also be the object attacked to the leather strap around his neck?

Or it may be a locket attached to the leather strap?

comment.author: 11998462@N08
comment._content: The jacket appears to be what was known as a nine button commutation jacket. The strap even though short could be a drum sling.
